item.description:
Strega-North End ( http://www.stregaristorante.com/) is not to be confused with Strega-Waterfront, though they have the same owner. For Restaurant Week, we can choose from a menu of 4 appetizers, 4 entrees and 3 desserts. The cost is $33+tax(7%), tip(18%) and drinks. You may alternatively, order off their regular menu. The cuisine is all Italian and the portions are large. Please bring cash, as we won't get separate checks.

The restaurant is located on the right side of Hanover Street as you're coming from the Greenway. Join us for a drink at the small bar if you get there between 6:30 and 7:00. The place is not very big, so I will not be able to add seats.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar until 7:00.
item.name: Strega-Restaurant Week Dinner
